Order - Appointment (NBN) Confirmed.description: Confirms the customer's NBN appointment details including site address, ID, and timeslot.

Order - Appointment (NBN) Changed.subjectPattern: Your NBN appointment has been changed
Order - Appointment (NBN) Changed.description: Notifies the customer that their NBN appointment details have been updated.

Order - New Appointment (NBN) Required.subjectPattern: Action required: Book a new NBN appointment
Order - New Appointment (NBN) Required.description: Informs the customer that a new NBN appointment needs to be booked.

Order NBN - Appointment Reschedule Requi.subjectPattern: Action required: Book a new NBN appointment
Order NBN - Appointment Reschedule Requi.description: Requests the customer to reschedule their NBN appointment.

Order - Appointment (NBN) Reminder.description: Reminds the customer of their upcoming NBN appointment.

Order - Appointment (NBN) Cancelled.subjectPattern: Your NBN appointment has been cancelled
Order - Appointment (NBN) Cancelled.description: Informs the customer that their scheduled NBN appointment has been cancelled.

Order NBN - Appointment Cancelled.subjectPattern: Your NBN appointment has been cancelled
Order NBN - Appointment Cancelled.description: Duplicate trigger using the same cancellation template for NBN appointments.

Order (NBN) - On Hold.subjectPattern: Your NBN order is currently on hold
Order (NBN) - On Hold.description: Advises the customer that their NBN order has been placed on hold.

Order (NBN) - Cancelled.subjectPattern: Your NBN order has been cancelled
Order (NBN) - Cancelled.description: Confirms that the NBN order has been cancelled and is no longer in progress.

Order NBN Activation - Cancelled.subjectPattern: Your NBN order has been cancelled
Order NBN Activation - Cancelled.description: Duplicate trigger using the same cancellation template for NBN activations.

Order (NBN) - Rejected.subjectPattern: Your NBN order could not be processed
Order (NBN) - Rejected.description: Informs the customer that their NBN order could not be processed successfully.

Order NBN Activation - Rejected.subjectPattern: Your NBN order could not be processed
Order NBN Activation - Rejected.description: Duplicate trigger using the same rejection template for NBN activations.

Order NBN Terminate - Completed.subjectPattern: Your NBN service has been cancelled
Order NBN Terminate - Completed.description: Confirms that the customer's NBN service termination is complete.

Order (NBN Plan Change) - Completed.subjectPattern: Your NBN plan change is complete
Order (NBN Plan Change) - Completed.description: Confirms that the customer's NBN plan has been successfully changed.

Order (NBN Activation) - Completed.subjectPattern: Your NBN service is now active
Order (NBN Activation) - Completed.description: Confirms that the NBN service has been activated. Postgres delineator determines Fibre Upgrade or No Fibre Upgrade template.

Order NBN - Appointment Completed Fibre.description: Confirms completion of the customer's NBN fibre upgrade appointment.

Order (NBN) - In Progress.subjectPattern: Your NBN service has been scheduled
Order (NBN) - In Progress.description: Notifies the customer that their NBN service order has been scheduled and is in progress.

Order NBN - NTD Installation Required.description: Advises the customer that an NBN technician appointment is required for installation.
